roleset.name: abut, be on the edge of
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to border.01 and neighbor.01. Border.01 and neighbor.01 are members of vncls contiguous_location-47.8. Framed by Katie.

example.name: both args
example.text: The popliteal is patent and is contiguous with all three tibial vessels.

example.name: Non-medical
example.text: The beds of ironstone are contiguous to the coal strata.
